item.title: Make Large-Scale Refactors Easy with Parallel AI Agents
item.description: Learn how to turn week-long refactors into 20-minute tasks using 15 AI agents working in parallel. A practical guide to distributed AI orchestration for large-scale code changes.

item.title: Word Doc to PDF: Evaluating Tools and Landing on PowerAutomate
item.description: Automated Word to PDF conversion is harder than it looks. Learn from our trials with Foxit PDF and IronPDF, and why Microsoft Power Automate won for pixel-perfect fidelity.

item.title: OpenAI Chat Model Cheat Sheet - Decoding the Chaos
item.description: OpenAI model names (o4, 4o, 4.1) are confusing. Quick reference guide to GPT-5, GPT-4.1, mini, nano, and legacy models with strengths, trade-offs, and best use cases.

item.title: Fixing the 'PowerShell session not found' issue in VS Code
item.description: Fix the 'PowerShell session not found' error in VS Code by manually setting the PowerShell executable path. Quick solution for macOS users with Homebrew installations.

item.title: Connecting Windows VMs to Mac-Hosted APIs
item.description: Securely connect Windows VM apps to Mac-hosted APIs using SSH tunnels and dev certificates. Complete guide for Parallels development with .NET and IdentityServer.

item.title: .NET Aspire in Windows VM using Docker on the Mac Host
item.description: Run .NET Aspire in a Windows VM while leveraging macOS Docker daemon via SSH context. Avoid nested virtualization and Docker duplication on Apple Silicon Macs.

item.title: Cocona - Clean console apps in .NET
item.description: Build clean .NET CLI apps with Cocona framework. Automatic help pages, dependency injection, and command parsing make console applications simple and maintainable.

item.title: .NET MAUI setup on macOS - build once, run everywhere
item.description: Complete .NET MAUI setup guide for macOS. Install workload, Xcode, and Android Studio to build cross-platform apps for iOS, Android, and Mac with one codebase.

item.title: Your Data Is Power - Even Your Search History
item.description: Companies combine your data for insights. Learn how to take back control by tracking your own Safari browser history with a simple macOS script and SQLite queries.

item.title: RAID - Rapid AI Development
item.description: Use AI to build features fast, then replace with optimized code later. RAID approach lets you ship quickly while managing technical debt strategically.

item.title: ðŸš¦ Loading Guards in Blazor - Stop Writing Null-Checks Everywhere
item.description: Eliminate scattered null-checks in Blazor with loading guard components. Clean pattern for handling async data loading with skeletons and progressive UI rendering.

item.title: The Right Mobile App Framework - Comprehensive Decision Tree
item.description: Choose the right mobile framework with this decision tree. Compare PWA, React Native, Flutter, .NET MAUI, and native development based on your team and requirements.

item.title: Guide to professional Growth
item.description: Transition from developer to management with 4 proven strategies. Be visible, understand company goals, be memorable, and do the job you want before you have it.

item.title: Cultural Exchange - 2 Months with SSW France
item.description: Two months living and working in Strasbourg with SSW France. First solo travel experience across 5 European countries with valuable lessons in independence and adaptability.

item.title: .NET MAUI Blazor template - Build your UI once
item.description: Build cross-platform apps with one shared Blazor UI codebase. Run on Android, iOS, Windows, macOS, and web using .NET MAUI and Blazor hybrid architecture.

item.title: .NET MAUI vs Flutter - Multi-platform frameworks showdown
item.description: A hands-on comparison of .NET MAUI and Flutter for cross-platform development. Compare native UI, markup languages, and developer experience to choose the right framework.
